name: Search Portal Recipes
description: Search pre-built portal recipes (multi-component patterns) for common use cases like 'super fun times', 'creative playground', 'game center', 'entertainment hub', etc. Returns complete component configurations that can be used to build engaging portals.

query.description: Natural language search query (e.g., 'fun portal', 'creative experience', 'games', 'entertainment', 'wellness', 'fitness')

limit.description: Maximum number of recipes to return

examples.query: I want to relax and meditate
